name: ENERGEMA: Arachnophobia
description:
ENERGEMA: Arachnophobia OFFICIAL TRAILER:

Game Story:

The Great Lion , "Alpha Force", must get as many E - gems (Blue gems) as possible. The E - gems are a powerfull energies for the Universe creation.

The enemies, the "Arachs" , they will try to stop the advance of the "Great Lion" to the last room where is "The Golden Book of Wisdom"!...

The adventure is Now!....
